name: Unique Tastes
description:
Welcome to Unique Tastes.

You're working at Auto-Diner. With no one else on the payroll, it's just you and Auto-Dish, the friendly robot companion for Auto-Cooking Industries.

Made for Wowie Jam 4.0, this game follows the theme "Collaborate with AI". Your job is to listen to customer requests and help Auto-Dish learn to generate tailored Dishes for them. By buying Dishes from Auto-Dish, it will learn and adjust existing configurations for that specific request. Over time, you can perfect dishes this way and reach 5 medals.

More medals? More money, more time. You're on the clock at Auto-Diner and you've got limited funds. Impress those customers or they wont pay enough to keep you going!

Unfortunately, I didn't have time to add any music. Feel free to listen to your own!

Unique Flavours was made by one person (me) with all assets being my own creation.

Game made by:

Like this game?

Checkout HIVE on steam! It's much more polished than this game and took over 2 years to make!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2077120/Hive/
